episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1101_010:
The Alola Region Fair was being held on
Pasio.
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1101_020:
It was garnering a lot of popularity as
a spot where one could go to enjoy
Alolan specialties.
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_030: The fair seems to be a success!
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_040: All thanks to your support, of course.
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_050:
This was also made possible by everyone
from Alola who pitched in to help out...
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_060: and the employees of Aether Foundation.
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_070:
Our planner has been very enthusiastic
about this project.
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_080:
Oh? Did I just hear you mention me, the
Aether Foundation’s last line of defense?
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_090:
I am Faba, the planner and the one
responsible for this event!
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_100: So it was your idea, Faba!
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_110:
You should be proud of the work
you’ve done. Keep it up!
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_120:
Yes, of course, sir! Rest assured, I’ll continue
to exceed your expectations!
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_130:
The Aether Foundation’s reputation will
surely reap the benefits of this fair!
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_140:
And so, President Lusamine, if you’d be so
kind as to consider that promotion for me,
I’m sure—
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_150:
Please remember that this event was not a
solo endeavor on your part.
episode_event_specialcos08/4001_1001_170:
Bwahahaha! It seems that—like me—you’re
being put through your paces, Faba! I know
the feeling!
episode_event_specialcos08/6801_1031_010:
See a different side of
yourself!
episode_event_specialcos08/6801_1001_010:
Both people and Pokémon are able to adapt
to new environments!
episode_event_specialcos08/6801_1001_020:
I guess you could say changes in your
environment are an opportunity to meet
another side of yourself.
episode_event_specialcos08/6801_1001_030:
(I’d rather just stay the same, even if I go
somewhere new...)
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_030:
That’s a rather...loud outfit you’ve got on.
Did you want to try out a new look?
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_050:
Larry, I hear you have plans to go to the
Alola fair on your day off?
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_100:
It’s a present. Consider it my thanks for
all your hard work.
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_110:
I figured if you’re going to the Alola fair,
you’ll enjoy it even more wearing that outfit!
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_140:
It was a kind gesture, so I couldn’t NOT
wear it...
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_150:
Hahaha... Nothing you can do about that,
I suppose.
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_160:
I personally would have been more
comfortable in my usual attire...
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_170:
but that aside, today is a great opportunity
to try out some Alolan cuisine.
episode_event_specialcos08/4002_1001_180:
Flamigo and I plan on resting our wings and
enjoying our time here.
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_030: What are your thoughts on Pasio Academy?
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_050:
I’d be more than happy to be a guest
lecturer here!
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_070: Wow! We did it, Director Clavell!
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_080: I’m looking forward to his lectures myself.
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_120:
We heard that some academy students were
causing trouble...
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_130: Students from the academy, you say?
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_140:
Director, you’ve heard that an Alola fair’s
under way, right?
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_150: Yes, indeed. Is it related to that?
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_160:
Some students claiming to be from Pasio
Academy have been posting about the fair
on social media...
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_170:
but it’s all this really inflammatory, negative
stuff...
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_180:
They’ve been harassing the vendors at the
fair, baiting them to get angry...
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_190:
And they’ve been writing over-the-top
negative reviews about the food being
served...
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_200: Why would they do such a thing?
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_210:
I think they’re just doing it for the views.
That sort of content tends to attract a lot of
attention.
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_220:
People share and comment more on
content like that, so the person who posted it
can get a lot of attention.
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_230:
But we still don’t know who’s doing this,
’cause they’ve been hiding their faces and
names.
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_240:
And it would only add fuel to the fire if we
tried to identify them publicly...
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_260:
We would really like to get them to stop
as soon as possible.
episode_event_specialcos08/4003_1001_270:
We’ve seen comments from people saying
they want to know who’s posting so they
can get back at them...
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_010:
(Let’s see... First is the Take Down steak?
The thickness is fantastic. And each bite
floods my mouth with delicious umami...)
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_020:
(Now, next we have a malasada. It’s soft
but also pleasantly chewy... Just like the
guidebook said.)
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_030:
(Tapu Cocoa... What a heartwarming flavor.
It’s so simple, and yet there’s a subtle
complexity to it...)
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_060:
(The menu says they have meat, fish, and
vegetarian sets...)
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_080: Excuse me. Could I have a special Z-Set?
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_090:
Thanks for stopping by! One special set
coming right up!
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_100:
People say our flavors are pretty unique...
Does that sound OK?
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_150:
(The flavors are indeed unique...but they’re
not bad at all.)
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_160:
(So this is what Alolan home cooking tastes
like...)
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_180: Thanks again for stopping by! Come again!
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_190:
Unbelievable... He finished an entire
special...
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_200: And he was really savoring it, too!
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_220:
I also tried one of those specials... But I
couldn’t finish it.
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_250:
You must have me confused
with someone else.
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_260:
The name’s Clive. I’m a Pasio Academy
student.
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_280:
Oh! I don’t have time to chat. Sorry, but
I should go.
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_290: There’s something I need to take care of.
episode_event_specialcos08/4004_1001_300: (Is that part of his job at the academy?)
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_010:
(Phew... That was close. I was almost
discovered!)
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_020:
(I have to hurry and find those students who
are causing trouble.)
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_040: I’m looking for some Alolan specialties...
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_050: Oh, I know a place you could go!
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_060: There’s more to Alola than just the food!
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_090:
Oh! Well, hello there. Good to meet you.
I’m Oak—Samson Oak.
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_100:
I’m a Pokémon researcher studying regional
variants in Alola!
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_120:
Ahem... Pardon me, but...you’re Professor
Oak, right?
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_140:
Actually, the Professor Oak from Kanto is
my cousin Samuel.
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_150:
People sometimes get us mixed up...
But if you look closely, we’re pretty different,
wouldn’t you say?
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_160: Oh! My apologies! Er—I mean, my bad!
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_170:
Oh, wow! You look just like what I saw in
the magazines and stuff! This is THE
Alolan experience!
episode_event_specialcos08/4005_1001_180:
Would you like to listen to his lecture with
us? I’m sure it’d be pretty helpful, if you’re
a student...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_020:
I wasn’t expecting such an informative
lecture about regional variants!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_030: Hahaha! I’m honored that you found it useful!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_040:
I enjoyed myself thoroughly... That lecture
was worth every second.
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_050:
Oh, man! I just remembered I was
supposed to be doing something else!
Please excuse me!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_060:
I spent too much time here... I need to get
back to my search!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_080:
Yes, actually. I’m looking for some students
who were causing a fuss on social media...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_090:
Wh-what?! Negative reviews
about the fair?!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_120:
Apparently, they’re using social media
accounts to flood us with bad reviews...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_140:
I can’t have trouble at a fair that I’M in
charge of planning!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_150:
Why, I’ll get all the blame if it becomes a
liability, and my status at the foundation
will be at stake!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_160: But what can we do about it?
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_170:
Hey. Could you let us in on some of the
details of that?
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_180:
And who are YOU? Outsiders have no
business with us!
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_190:
Students from the academy I attend might be
behind this.
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_210:
Let us help you find the people behind those
social media accounts.
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_220:
I’m sure we’ll be able to find them faster
if we join forces.
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_230: If that’s the case, I might have a lead...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_250:
I saw some rowdy kids causing a fuss while
I was enjoying some Alolan dishes...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_260:
I just wanted to enjoy my food in peace, so
I drove them off with a Pokémon battle...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_270:
But at the time, I didn’t realize they were
causing an even bigger problem.
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_280:
It’s not much, but I do remember their faces,
so perhaps I could lend you a hand...
episode_event_specialcos08/4006_1001_290: Really?! Quickly, then! Lead the way!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_010:
Look at this! THIS is what you call customer
service?!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_020: Hey! You’re the little scoundrels, aren’t you!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_030:
You’re the troublemakers behind those
ridiculous videos!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_050:
Yeah, it was us! We’re students from Pasio
Academy, and we’ve been causing ALL kinds
of trouble!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_080:
I know each and every one of the students
at the academy.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_090:
You’re not actually students at Pasio
Academy, are you.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_110:
We were just trying to take down that
academy full of nothin’ but goody-goodies!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_120:
Yeah! We hate getting judged! And trying to
fit into society is a drag!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_130:
We’re gonna live our lives how WE wanna
live ’em!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_140:
Plus, I don’t wanna be a boring adult when
I grow up...
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_160:
Look at him! He’s sooo desperate to get a
promotion! How pathetic is that?!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_180: Well, I can’t say you’re completely wrong...
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_190:
In this world, freedom is limited—especially
once you become a working adult.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_210:
However, I’m of the opinion that NOT
standing out is one way to live...
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_220:
One that allows you to focus on the things
you want to do.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_230:
Stand out in a bad way, and you get
hammered back in. That’s about as far from
freedom as you can get.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_240:
Right now, by making all of this fuss and
trouble...
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_250:
aren’t you just creating more of a hassle
and less freedom for yourselves?
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_270:
As long as you follow the rules, nobody can
get on your case about how you live your
life.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_280:
And as long as your work’s done on time,
you can spend the rest of your day
however you please.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_300:
There are times when adapting to your
environment, rather than fighting it, can
draw out your hidden potential!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_310:
That’s something I’ve learned from
researching Pokémon regional variants!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_330:
Also, Pasio Academy is not the kind of place
that’d try to hold you back from being who
you are and doing what you want to do.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_340:
You should really give it a try before
jumping to conclusions.
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_350: Ugh! Stop nagging, already. We get it!
episode_event_specialcos08/4007_1001_360:
We’ll stop posting, if that gets you old fogies
off our backs.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1101_010:
After that, the Alola fair ended as a huge
success.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_020:
I was quite worried at one point, but now I
can breathe a sigh of relief!
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_030:
By the way, young man...are you interested
in advancing your career?
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_040:
I would be more than happy to submit a
referral on your behalf to the
Aether Foundation.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_050: Sorry, but no can do. After all...
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_060:
Allow me to reintroduce myself. My name
is Clavell.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_070:
I disguised myself to go undercover, but I’m
actually the director of an academy in the
Paldea region.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_090:
Oh, my! I DID wonder why you were so
well-mannered!
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_100:
Wow, you’re the director? My apologies for
any rudeness on my part!
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_120:
Eeek! D-don’t tell me YOU are also someone
important in disguise!
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_130:
No, I’m not. I’m just your average, everyday
employee...
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_140:
I just wanted to say...I had a great day off
at the Alola fair.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_150: All of the food was outstanding. Thank you.
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_160:
(Living an ordinary life may seem easy, but
it’s actually quite hard to achieve.)
episode_event_specialcos08/4008_1001_170:
(I should ask him to give a lecture one of
these days, too...)
